simplified_text:
Esme went to play.
She saw a big slide.
It was so high.
Up she went.

text:
Down at PlayWorld, what did she spy?
A slide that stretched up to the sky!
"Could this be magic?" Esme asked,
As up the steps she quickly dashed.

lines: Down at PlayWorld, what did she spy?
A slide that stretched up to the sky!
As up the steps she quickly dashed.

simplified_text:
Down she went fast.
The slide was fun.
She got off the slide.
She saw a puzzle.

text:
With whoosh and zoom, she slid so fast,
Through twisty tunnels, unsurpassed!
At home she found a puzzle scene,
With Spider-Man in red and green.

lines: With whoosh and zoom, she slid so fast,
At home she found a puzzle scene,
With Spider-Man in red and green.

simplified_text:
The puzzle fell down.
Parts went on the floor.
Esme can see them.
She can fix it.

text:
The pieces scattered on the floor,
Some under tables, behind the door.
But Esme's clever mind could see
Just where each piece was meant to be.

lines: The pieces scattered on the floor,
Some under tables, behind the door.
But Esme's clever mind could see
Just where each piece was meant to be.

simplified_text:
Esme sees the pool.
She jumps in it.
"Dad, look at me!"
She swims and plays.

text:
Then splash! Into the pool she leapt,
Where colorful rings so gently slept.
"Watch this, Dad!" she called with pride,
As deep beneath the waves she glided.

lines: Then splash! Into the pool she leapt,
Where colorful rings so gently slept.
"Watch this, Dad!" she called with pride,
As deep beneath the waves she glided.

simplified_text:
The sun is red.
Birds fly up high.
Esme sits with Mom.
Dad sits with them.

text:
The sun began to paint the sky,
When pelicans came swooping by.
At jetty's edge with Mum and Dad,
The best adventure Esme had!

lines: The sun began to paint the sky,
At jetty's edge with Mum and Dad,

simplified_text:
The boats go home.
Birds fly in the sky.
Esme had fun.
It was a good day.

text:
The boats sailed home through golden light,
While birds performed their graceful flight.
And Esme learned that special days
Come wrapped in many wondrous ways.

lines: The boats sailed home through golden light,
While birds performed their graceful flight.
And Esme learned that special days
Come wrapped in many wondrous ways.
